Package org.openpnp.machine.reference

Class ReferencePnpJobProcessor.Locator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.machine.reference.ReferencePnpJobProcessor.Locator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TravellingSalesman.Locator<PnpJobPlanner.PlannedPlacement>
    Enclosing class:
    ReferencePnpJobProcessor
    protected abstract class ReferencePnpJobProcessor.Locator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TravellingSalesman.Locator<PnpJobPlanner.PlannedPlacement>
    Create a class to group all pick, align an placement locator functions and to get rid of the lengthy "TravellingSalesman.Locator" This class uses the nozzles toHeadLocation() method to transform a location into the reference space of the head and apply angular offsets of the nozzle, which depend on the configured nozzle rotation mode. The location (x, y, z) is always correct, but the angle only if the nozzle rotation mode was applied before.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public abstract Location getLocation​(PnpJobPlanner.PlannedPlacement p)
        This method is called to query the approximate location of the head for a given placement. The location is in the reference system of the head in order to compare it with others or to apply math like calculating the center between them.
        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface TravellingSalesman.Locator<PnpJobPlanner.PlannedPlacement>

      • toString

        public abstract java.lang.String toString()
        toString is used in log messages to generate meaningful messages where it locator as been used.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • convertToHeadLocation

        protected Location convertToHeadLocation​(HeadMountable hm,
                                         Location ref)
        Return the location of the head when the headmountable hm is at location ref. This method is used to convert locations, calculated for eg. a nozzle to a head location to return it via getLocation() above.
